------=_Part_129921_2095041046.1420878206881
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Thanks, Ken, for those pointers.=C2=A0
I do read a lot of papers and am fam=
iliar with that style in general. =C2=A0And yes, it is a cultural issue. Bu=
t one I'm at home with. It is good to know that they do attempt some level =
of double-blind approaches.
I once tried my hand at fiction and was told it=
 read like a research paper! I gave up trying to write science fiction.=C2=
=A0
Now, if only I can find someone willing to pay me to do this research, =
I can make much more progress. But then I would have to become a Professor =
myself, but we both know the effort and time that would take. Being the Aut=
odidact that I am probably would not help much in that, either. But I digre=
ss.
Most importantly, I thank you for creating NEAT. It alone has reawakene=
d my interests in neural nets and AI in general.

Kind Regards,

Fred Mitch=
ell,=C2=A0


+49 (0)15 259 409475, Skype: flajann
